languages.text: {n}Абеляр багровеет от ярости, но неимоверным усилием воли он берет себя в руки.{/n} "Прискорбно слышать это от вас. После всех лет службы при {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольном Торговце{/g} фон Валанциус... вероятно, умение Леди Теодоры ценить верность не передается в крови. Всего наилучшего, {name} — при первой возможности я покину пустотный корабль и вернусь в семейное имение на Даргонусе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр багровеет от ярости, но неимоверным усилием воли он берет себя в руки.{/n} "Прискорбно слышать это от вас. После всех лет службы при {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольном Торговце{/g} фон Валанциус... вероятно, умение Леди Теодоры ценить верность не передается в крови. Всего наилучшего, {name} — при первой возможности я покину пустотный корабль и вернусь в семейное имение на Даргонусе".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр багровеет от ярости, но неимоверным усилием воли он берет себя в руки.{/n} "Прискорбно слышать это от вас. После всех лет службы при {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольном Торговце{/g} фон Валанциус... вероятно, умение Леди Теодоры ценить верность не передается в крови. Всего наилучшего, {name} — при первой возможности я покину пустотный корабль и вернусь в семейное имение на Даргонусе".

After all my years of service to the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸色因为愤怒而变得发紫，但他以惊人的意志力克制住了怒火。{/n}“我为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}服务了这么多年，如今听到这样的消息，这真是让我感到遗憾。看来，西奥多拉夫人对忠诚的重视并没有在她的血脉中传承下去。祝您一切顺利，{name}。我会离开这艘虚空舰，尽快返回达戈努斯的家族庄园。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸色因为愤怒而变得发紫，但他以惊人的意志力克制住了怒火。{/n}“我为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}服务了这么多年，如今听到这样的消息，这真是让我感到遗憾。看来，西奥多拉夫人对忠诚的重视并没有在她的血脉中传承下去。祝您一切顺利，{name}。我会离开这艘虚空舰，尽快返回达戈努斯的家族庄园。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best,  — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."

languages.text: {n}Abelard se enfurece hasta ponerse morado, pero con un increíble esfuerzo de voluntad logra recomponerse.{/n} «Lamento oírle decir eso. Tras todos estos años al servicio de los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} de la dinastía von Valancius... parece que el talento de lady Theodora para valorar la lealtad no era algo que se transmite por la sangre. Le deseo lo mejor, {name}. Abandonaré la nave del vacío y volveré a la finca familiar en Dargonus en cuanto tenga ocasión».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se enfurece hasta ponerse morado, pero con un increíble esfuerzo de voluntad logra recomponerse.{/n} «Lamento oírle decir eso. Tras todos estos años al servicio de los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} de la dinastía von Valancius... parece que el talento de lady Theodora para valorar la lealtad no era algo que se transmite por la sangre. Le deseo lo mejor, {name}. Abandonaré la nave del vacío y volveré a la finca familiar en Dargonus en cuanto tenga ocasión».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは怒りで顔を赤らめかけたが、驚くほどの意志の力により、どうにか己を押し留めた。{/n}「それは残念です。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に長年仕えてきたというのに…シオドーラ様の忠誠心を重んじる才能は、血の中に受け継がれなかったようですね。幸運を祈ります、{name}。私はこの船を離れ、ダルゴナスの家領に戻るつもりです」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは怒りで顔を赤らめかけたが、驚くほどの意志の力により、どうにか己を押し留めた。{/n}「それは残念です。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に長年仕えてきたというのに…シオドーラ様の忠誠心を重んじる才能は、血の中に受け継がれなかったようですね。幸運を祈ります、{name}。私はこの船を離れ、ダルゴナスの家領に戻るつもりです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard läuft vor Zorn purpurrot an, doch mit unbändiger Willenskraft reißt er sich am Riemen.{/n} "Bedauerlich. Nach all meinen Jahren in Diensten der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} der Dynastie von Valancius ... Lady Theodoras Gabe, Loyalität wertzuschätzen, liegt der Familie wohl nicht im Blut. Alles Gute, {name} — ich werde das Raumschiff bei nächstbester Gelegenheit verlassen und auf das Anwesen meiner Familie auf Dargonus zurückkehren."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard läuft vor Zorn purpurrot an, doch mit unbändiger Willenskraft reißt er sich am Riemen.{/n} "Bedauerlich. Nach all meinen Jahren in Diensten der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} der Dynastie von Valancius ... Lady Theodoras Gabe, Loyalität wertzuschätzen, liegt der Familie wohl nicht im Blut. Alles Gute, {name} — ich werde das Raumschiff bei nächstbester Gelegenheit verlassen und auf das Anwesen meiner Familie auf Dargonus zurückkehren."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard s'empourpre de colère, mais il parvient à se maîtriser au prix d'un incroyable effort de volonté.{/n} « Je suis navré de vous l'entendre dire. Après toutes ces années au service {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des libres-marchands|des libres-marchandes}{/g} de la dynastie von Valancius... Dame Théodora savait estimer la loyauté à sa juste valeur, mais visiblement, c'est un talent qui ne se transmet pas par le sang. Au revoir, {name}. Je quitterai le vaisseau à la première occasion et retournerai dans mon domaine familiale de Dargonus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard s'empourpre de colère, mais il parvient à se maîtriser au prix d'un incroyable effort de volonté.{/n} « Je suis navré de vous l'entendre dire. Après toutes ces années au service {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des libres-marchands|des libres-marchandes}{/g} de la dynastie von Valancius... Dame Théodora savait estimer la loyauté à sa juste valeur, mais visiblement, c'est un talent qui ne se transmet pas par le sang. Au revoir, {name}. Je quitterai le vaisseau à la première occasion et retournerai dans mon domaine familiale de Dargonus. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, öfkeden küplere binse de müthiş iradesiyle kendini dizginliyor.{/n} "Bunu duymak üzücü. Von Valancius hanedanlığının {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'ine{/g} bunca yıl hizmet ettikten sonra... Leydi Theodora'nın haklı olarak sadakate verdiği değerin kalıtsal olmadığını görmüş oldum. Yolunuz açık olsun {name}. En kısa zamanda gemiden ayrılıp Dargonus'taki aile mülkümüze döneceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns purple with rage, but with an incredible effort of will, he pulls himself together.{/n} "It's unfortunate to hear that. After all my years of service to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty... It seems Lady Theodora's talent for valuing loyalty isn't carried in the blood. All the best, {name} — I will leave the voidship and return to the family estate on Dargonus at the closest opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard öfkeden küplere biniyor ama müthiş iradesiyle kendini dizginliyor.{/n} "Bunu duymak üzücü. Von Valancius hanedanlığının {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'ine bunca yıl hizmet ettikten sonra... Leydi Theodora'nın haklı olarak sadakate verdiği değerin kalıtsal olmadığını görmüş oldum. Yolunuz açık olsun. En kısa zamanda gemiden ayrılıp Dargonus'taki aile mülkümüze döneceğim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
